messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Re:  Unitarian/Pagan  Candice
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 2/10/01 10:47:54 AM Pacific Standard Time, GeorganneD@aol.com writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 2/10/01 10:47:54 AM Pacific Standard Time,
GeorganneD@... writes:

<< I feel supported and
spiritually comfortable at my UU congregation. Try it out.
>>

Thanks for the suggestion. I was actually talking to my husband about
searching for a church earlier this week. We've moved a lot, and each time we
have difficulty finding a place where we are comfortable.

candice
~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Hold fast to dreams
For if dreams die
Life is a broken-winged bird
That cannot fly.
-Langston Hughes

messages.subject: Re:  Unitarian/Pagan  Candice
messages.msgSnippet: I would recommend looking in your yellow pages and attending Sunday services at whatever churches you consider within a reasonable distance.  You ll figure out
messages.messageBody:
I would recommend looking in your yellow pages and attending Sunday services
at whatever churches you consider within a reasonable distance. You'll
figure out whether you like it before you know what it really is about. I
personally feel a great awe at the fact of life on this planet and feel that
religion is often a powerful aid to many, but was uncomfortable as part of
any group with a "holier than thou" attitude. I feel supported and
spiritually comfortable at my UU congregation. Try it out.
